text:
Grammatical error in the Platform-specific Notes chapter: Overview: Microsoft Windows

Compiling Apache
 
There are many important points before you begin compiling Apache. This document explain them.

Change "explain" to "explains".

Also, it would read better if something like "to consider" were inserted after "important points".

Gary
creator: gSchnabl@SWDetroit.com

text: Moving docs bugs to docs@httpd.a.o ownership.
creator: rbowen@apache.org

text: Added the "to consider" to trunk docs, r1029865.  The "this document explain" sentence doesn't appear to be there anymore.  Thanks for the report.
creator: poirier@pobox.com
